verbs.description: [ARG1: furyk] [V: was] ‘ devastated’ [ARG2: over ryder cup team] in - fighting the 2018 us ryder cup team was arguably the most talented in the history of the event but they were embarrassed by a european team that had better chemistry and seemed more interested in competing the more we hear the more it sounds like the trouble for team usa started well before friday afternoon foursomes sweep dustin johnson and brooks koepka reportedly got into a heated argument and nearly came to blows hours after the ryder cup europe twitter team usa patrick reed atlanta jim furyk ryder cup paris dustin johnson us brooks koepka jordan spieth furyk
